name: Schwarzkopf Professional Bonacure Color Freeze Conditioner pH 4.5, 1000 ml
review: First of all this bottle is HUGE. I really didn't know what to expect but as I've dyed my hair a fair amount and it is naturally quite course and dry I figured I'd give it a shot.  After ONE USE of this (plus the shampoo) my hair was noticeably different and softer. It wasn't frizzy or strawlike even after blowdrying. I even dyed it again the next day and the hair still feels soft and healthy and fade on the colour is minimal. I'm really impressed. The only criticism I have is that the bottles are a bit awkward as they have screw caps with spouted tops and as they are quite large, it is a handful to manage the bottle (a pump or flip cap would have been ideal). Overall, worth the investment.
